name: phthalic acid, dibutyl ester
Restrictions: Only to be used as: (a)plasticiser in repeated use materials and articles contacting non-fatty foods;(b)technical support agent in polyolefins in concentrations up to 0,05 % in the final product.
NotesCompliance: V7 If testing in food is performed, Annex V 1.4 shall be taken into account.
